means: 用文火焖烧，熏烧，慢燃( smolder的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Kneeling in front of the open hearth, old Maria was fanning the smoldering fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 老玛丽亚跪在壁炉前的空地上，扇着闷燃的炉火。

sentence.Network_en: The mat was smoldering where the burning log had fallen.
sentence.Network_cn: 燃烧的木棒落下的地方垫子慢慢燃烧起来。

sentence.Network_en: The wood was smoldering in the fireplace.
